title: Golfer
summaries: The Golfer is an NPC vendor who sells golfing-related items. More items will be unlocked as the player's golf score increases, including clubs, trophies, and paintings. He will move in once the following criteria are met:

• There is an available vacant house.
  • Rescuing him as the Golfer Rescue, who can be rarely encountered in the Underground Desert. Interacting with him in this state with âš· Open / Activate will free him. If the stationary Golfer is killed, he will still be able to respawn afterwards; if the Golfer NPC is killed, he will move in again after some time as long as there are vacant houses.
The Golfer will attack nearby <linked>enemies</linked> with his golf balls to defend himself.
He is one of the few entities that can be detected by the <linked>Lifeform Analyzer</linked> or its upgrades.
